Name: R Sampath Raj
Tweet: My humble tributes to Bharat Ratna Dr. Babasaheb on #AmbedkarJayanti. #BabaSahebAmbedkar gave us the ideals of social justice n equality as an architect of our Constitution.  He championed the cause of socially deprived n economically marginalised all his life.  https://t.co/yJd2dmHIZG
